title: Pymatgen Slab Generator Parameters Schema
description: Parameters for the Pymatgen slab generator. https://github.com/materialsproject/pymatgen/blob/585bb673c4aa222669c4b0d72ffeec3dbf092630/pymatgen/core/surface.py#L1187

min_vacuum_size.description: Minimum size of the vacuum in layers or angstroms

in_unit_planes.description: Whether to use unit planes for the vacuum and slab size

reorient_lattice.description: Whether to reorient the lattice to have c vector along the z-axis
